Class MALandmarkGraph

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agreement_technologies.service.map_landmarks.MALandmarkGraph
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LandmarkGraph

    public class MALandmarkGraph
extends java.lang.Object
implements LandmarkGraph
    MALandmarkGraph is the multi-agent landmark graph (LG) implementation.

    1.0
